parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for political advertising.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and encourages voting for the candidates of the Partidul Social Democrat (PSD) for both the Senate and the Chamber of Deputies. This directly refers to specific parliamentary candidates and fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of Facebook as a platform further supports this conclusion. It addresses the wide population, fulfilling the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support the PSD candidates.  Phrases like "Vă îndemn să ieșiți la vot și să susțineți candidații Partidului Social Democrat" ("I urge you to go out and vote and support the candidates of the Social Democratic Party") explicitly aim to influence the electoral outcome. This fulfills the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific political party and its candidates, which is not consistent with journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear call to action to vote for a specific party.  The language used is persuasive and promotional, not reflective of a personal viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2259221664463522</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific parliamentary candidates (PSD), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing the vote in favor of the PSD. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>All PSD candidates for Senate and Chamber of Deputies</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Gireada Dumitru-Verginel, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 2259221664463522) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care îndeamnă la vot pentru candidații Partidului Social Democrat (PSD) la Senat și Camera Deputaților. Postarea, cu un buget de 100-199 RON, a atins 10.000-15.000 de impresii și o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, conține un apel explicit la vot pentru PSD ("Vă îndemn să ieșiți la vot și să susțineți candidații Partidului Social Democrat"), îndeplinind toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. Prezența numărului CMF 11240017 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Efectul electoral este clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea PSD.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt verginelgireada@gmail.com și +40755272595.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
